Title: #131: Daymond John—Lessons From the Shark Tank
Description:
Shark Tank’s Daymond John joins the podcast this week to share his story and give great advice to get you going. An entrepreneur in every sense of the word, Daymond grew FUBU, a fashionable sportswear line, from his initial $40 budget into a $6 billion brand. He’s the author of a new book, The Power of Broke.

Webinar Registration
